content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":311741,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/ee1925c1-1200-4580-a33e-6e7ee4e10058/Welcome.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/ee1925c1-1200-4580-a33e-6e7ee4e10058/Welcome.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Welcome.PNG\",\"name\":\"Welcome.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"ee1925c1-1200-4580-a33e-6e7ee4e10058\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029,\"height\":182.11666666666665},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You are welcome to our EPAM Quality management system (hereinafter – QMS) awareness training.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This training is intended for any EPAMers, regardless of position and functions. We are sure that each of us influences the quality of EPAM services and contributes to the success of EPAM.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Brief information about EPAM QMS, Compliance, Ethics and Compliance Library (hereinafter – ECL), Risk management, Audits and management systems certifications, and QMS updates will be presented.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This information will assist you in refreshing the basic knowledge about EPAM QMS; \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"provide information on EPAM QMS changes for the period of time between updates; guide you with information you should know for successful work\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":632628,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/7b104861-7d77-4dea-82d1-774e569b2e4a/1_QMS_AwareTRG_INTRODUCTION_.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/7b104861-7d77-4dea-82d1-774e569b2e4a/1_QMS_AwareTRG_INTRODUCTION_.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"1_QMS_AwareTRG_INTRODUCTION_.png\",\"name\":\"1_QMS_AwareTRG_INTRODUCTION_.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"7b104861-7d77-4dea-82d1-774e569b2e4a\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029,\"height\":578.8125},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please note that links are used for reference purpose and it’s not mandatory to follow all of them to finish this training course (you could use them for further reading to broaden your knowledge). Basic information is collected on ECL portal, you could bookmark any link and come back to it at any time you wish.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]}}"
